constants.heading: Global Constants
constants.remark: A list of protocol-wise constants that will never be changed.

items.name: MAX_PROOF_GENERATION_TIME_IN_SECONDS
items.meaning: The operator creates a block and submits it on-chain by calling commitBlock. He then has at most MAX_PROOF_GENERATION_TIME_IN_SECONDS seconds to submit a proof for the block using verifyBlock. A proof can be submitted any time between when the block is committed and MAX_PROOF_GENERATION_TIME_IN_SECONDS seconds afterward, verifying a block does not need to be done in the same order as they are committed.

globalParams.heading: Global Parameters
globalParams.remark: A list of protocol-wise parameters whose values can only be changed by Loopring protocol owner.

dexParams.heading: DEX Initialization Parameters
dexParams.remark: A list of per-DEX constants whose values are fixed once the DEX is forged.

items.name: on_chain_Data_Availability
items.meaning: True to indicate the DEX will use zkRollup to enable On-Chain Data-Availability. The parameter's value cannot be changed once the DEX is forged.

items.name: forge_Mode
items.meaning: Indicates how DEX upgradability should be supported. AUTO_UPGRADABLE indicates transparent upgradability. The other options are MANUAL_UPGRADABLE, PROXIED, and NATIVE. Check out our smart contract code for more details. The parameter's value cannot be changed once the DEX is forged.

onchainParams.heading: DEX On-Chain Parameters
onchainParams.remark: A list of DEX smart contract parameters whose values can only be changed by the DEX owner.

items.name: owner
items.meaning: The owner of the exchange, who can change the operator address and many other on-chain DEX parameters.

items.name: operator
items.meaning: The address that can submit and verify blocks. This can be a smart contract address for supporting multiple operators.

items.name: account_Creation_Fee_ETH
items.meaning: The amount of Ether charged by the DEX for the creation of a new account. DEXes should change this to non-zero to mitigate sybil attach.

items.name: account_Update_Fee_ETH
items.meaning: The amount of Ether charged by the DEX for updating an existing account.

items.name: deposit_Fee_ETH
items.meaning: The amount of Ether charged by the DEX for handling a deposit request.

items.name: withdrawal_Fee_ETH
items.meaning: The amount of Ether charged by the DEX for handling a withdrawal request.

items.name: address_Whitelist
items.meaning: The address of an IAddressWhitelist contract to filter addresses that can request account creation. This is the major approach for Loopring-based DEXes to implement KYC. IAddressWhitelist is designed such that whitelisting an address does NOT take an Ethereum transaction. The default value 0x0 indicats KYC is disabled by default.

offchainParams.heading: DEX Off-Chain Parameters
offchainParams.remark: A list of DEX circuit parameters whose values can only be changed by DEX operators very frequently, e.g. per order, token, trading-pair, or even per-trade. The maximum values are 0.63% in steps of 0.01% (1 bips)

items.name: ORDER_A_FEE_BIPS
items.meaning: The fee bips for the taker order to be charged by the DEX. If this parameter is non-zero, ORDER_A_REBATE_BIPS must be zero.

items.name: ORDER_B_FEE_BIPS
items.meaning: The fee bips for the maker order to be charged by the DEX. If this parameter is non-zero, ORDER_B_REBATE_BIPS must be zero.

items.name: ORDER_A_REBATE_BIPS
items.meaning: The rebate bips for the taker order to receive from the DEX. If this parameter is non-zero, ORDER_A_FEE_BIPS must be zero.

items.name: ORDER_B_REBATE_BIPS
items.meaning: The rebate bips for the maker order to receive from the DEX. If this parameter is non-zero, ORDER_B_FEE_BIPS must be zero.
